contacts.adminDescription:
If you need help with ${appTitle}, you can always contact me.
From time to time I'll also get in touch to give you a tip or two.
contacts.block: You can block this ${buddy}. He will no longer see you or any past chat between you. It's like you have unsubscribed. Blocked ${buddies} can be canceled at any time. Do you want to block this ${buddy}?
contacts.blockActionHint: Please explain why you want to report this entry!
contacts.blockedAction: This ${buddy} has now been blocked. You can unlock him in the last page of your settings.
contacts.denyAddToGroup: You can add only ${buddies} to your group, if you are friends. Click the asterisk in the bottom right corner to send a friendship request.

intro.bluetoothDescriptionBrowser: As soon as you have installed the app, you can find ${buddies} with similar interests in your immediate vicinity via Bluetooth matching. The browser doesn't support Bluetooth.
intro.bluetoothDescriptionLoggedOff: <title>Bluetooth Matching</title>Log in to find ${buddies} with similar interests in your immediate vicinity via Bluetooth matching.
intro.chatAi:
Artificial intelligence supports you in finding out your strengths and how you can develop them. Ask questions about this, the more precise, the better the answer. For example:
  • How can I build a community around painting, dancing, cooking, hiking, etc.?
  • Which philosopher is suitable for thinking about life?
intro.chatDescription: After logging in, you will see the list of ${buddies} with whom you have already chatted.
intro.chatEmpty: You don't have started any chats with other ${buddies} yet. Click on Chat in a ${buddies}'s profile.
intro.chats:
You have new chats
Here you will find the list of your chats.
intro.closeNews:
then you can:
  • Find cool Events in your current vicinity.
  • Spontaneously meet new ${buddies} for all kinds of doings.
  • Organize your own events and even earn money with them.
intro.closeNewsClub:
then you can:
  • Receive push notifications about our news
  • Cool Events from fans for fans, e.g. watching the games together, a Breakfast before the game, a regular regulars' table, etc.
  • Matching of fans with similar ones Interests across different criteria.
intro.contacts: You can find your friends as well as profile visitors in this area after logging in.
intro.descriptionNews: Sign up to get the latest articles pushed to your phone.
intro.epilog: That was a quick look at the app. Thank you very much for the time you took! You are welcome to rate us and leave a few words.<rating/>
intro.events: Events in which you participate or which you have created can be found here after logging in.
intro.home:
What is Fanclub?

For the club:
new marketing opportunities.

For the fan:
new fans get to know, regardless of whether you're in a foreign city or just want to meet new people.

But first things first, we'll introduce the app from the fan's point of view.
intro.home2: We'll log you in now to better introduce you to the app.
intro.home3:
Events by fans for fans, e.g. a brunch before a game, hiking together at the weekend, etc. can be found here.

In the line below you can find fans in your area.
intro.home4: Of course you can also search specifically for events and fans with similar interests, e.g. mountain biking, philosophizing, etc.
intro.searchExplained: Here you can search for fans, events and locations.
intro.marketingQuestions: Surveys and their evaluations are created in no time at all, so that you can get a quick, quantitative insight into the fan scene on any topic in the shortest possible time.
intro.notification: Here you will see your notifications, e.g. confirmations to your events.
intro.notificationEmpty: You do not have any notifications, yet.
intro.notifications:
You have new notifications
You can open them here.
intro.marketingStart: Clubs have an additional option that you can access via this button.
intro.search:
Fans can get to know each other quickly and anonymously via chat or video call, i.e. without exchanging phone numbers or emails.

Now but to the added value from club perspective...
intro.settings:
We're glad you've registered.
Here you can upload a photo of yourself and edit other settings.
intro.statisticsCharts: Statistical evaluations of all kinds give you different evaluations of the fan structure of the club.
intro.statisticsCharts2: e.g. the proportion male/female/diverse in the different age groups.
intro.statisticsMap: The geographic distribution helps you plan your next fan events better.
intro.teaserEvents: Do you want to do something? Here you can add easily new search request. matching ${buddies} in your area will be informed

locations.asMessage: I want to go there at {0}
locations.bonusHintEdit: Describe what you offer your customers in case of an immediate review, for example, an espresso or discount on the purchase just made. Your customer then shows you the confirmation page on his mobile, than you give him the bonus. Customers can redeem this bonus only once a week, because you can evaluate a Location week only once. Of course, your location is particularly emphasized in the ${appTitle} lists
locations.errorAddressFormat: Please enter a correct address with at least 2 rows.
locations.autoOpenHint: To view intressting locations, you need to enter locations, too. You entered {0}, when you entered 10 locations, than the location opens automatically.
locations.bonusHint: In order to accept the offer, you have to the location before payment rate and show the operator the confirmation page on your mobile.

locations.permission:
The location service is deactivated. The app collects location data to enable finding:

  • ${buddies} with Bluetooth Matching
This data along with all other data will never be passed to thrid parties.
locations.ratedBonusPageButton: Confirmation of the location owner:{0}will be paid out now!
locations.serviceError:

login.changePasswordBody: There must be at least 8 characters long. To please, for your own safety, not a trivial password.
login.failedApple: Your email address is not displayed to ${appTitle}. To use Apple login, we need your email. You may also use other login possibilities.

login.legal: I have read the Data Protection, Terms and Conditions, understand and accept them.
login.recoverPasswordBody: An email has been sent. With their help, you can login again.
login.recoverPasswordErrorEmail: Your information is incorrect. Note that all the fields must correspond to those, as you have entered with us.
login.recoverPasswordErrorSpam: The function was called too many times.
login.recoverPasswordErrorTime: You have already requested the reset. Please confirm this one first.
login.title: Login

marketing.engageToRegister:
Events, Events, Events!
Here in ${appTitle} it's about events, but also about spontaneous activities with like-minded ${buddies}!
Log in and you'll find out more.
marketing.inviteFriends: Invite your friends to help the community grow and get even more people to participate in surveys.
marketing.noResult: There were too few participants in the survey, the result cannot be displayed.
marketing.pollTerminated: The survey is over. You can only open the results if you have participated yourself.
marketing.validUntil:
This promotion runs until {0}
Hurry up, the offer lasts while stocks last.
Legal recourse is excluded.

settings.bdayNotBorn: Sorry, you're not even in the world. Only already born ${buddies} can register here in ${appTitle}.
settings.bdayTooOld: Are you actually already {1}? Respect, get in touch with us by phone and we will help with ${appTitle}. However, for the auto-enrollment you may not be older than {0}. In case your age is correct, you may make yourself a few years younger here on ${appTitle}. In real life, that's unfortunately not possible so far.
settings.bdayTooOld2: Wow, now you have managed {1} years in your life, and now this stupid computer program tells you that you are not allowed to sign up. Respect, get in touch with us by phone and we will help with ${appTitle}. However, for the auto-enrollment you may not be older than {0}, sorry!
settings.bdayTooYoung: You are only {1} years, which is too young for ${appTitle}. The minimum age is {0} years.
settings.bdayUsingInterrestedIn: "Prefered from" may only be used, when you enter your own birthday.
settings.bluetoothCheckbox: activate matching to find like minded nearby
settings.deleteExplain: Please write us a few more words so that we can improve.
settings.deleteExplainMoreWords: 3 words or even more would be nice.
settings.deleteProfileHint: Your data will be deleted forever after this confirmation. We only keep the reason for your deletion so that we can hopefully constantly improve. Please choose at least one reason:
settings.deleteReasonBenefit: don't understand the usefulness of the app
settings.genderSelectHint: You can change these fields after you have entered your age/birthday and gender.
settings.hintDeleteReasonTechnical: The app is brand new, can't you give us a few more months?
settings.hintDeleteReasonComplex: With valuable input from you we can make the app easier. Would you like to support us?
settings.hintDeleteReasonMessages: In the notifications above you can turn off specific notifications.
settings.hintDeleteReasonMolested: If you report exactly these contacts to us, we can specifically write to them and warn them to block them if necessary. No reason to leave, is there?
settings.hintDeleteReasonExpectation: We're sorry, did our marketing give the wrong impression?
settings.hintDeleteReasonBenefit: We want to connect you to contacts with similar interest, no matter where you are in the world. No dating, no sex, life is so much more than just superficiality.
settings.hintDeleteReasonNothing: Would you like to tell us what brought you here anyway?
settings.noAGB: Click on Data Protection to accept our terms and conditions.
settings.passwordWrong: The password must contain at least 8 characters.
settings.descriptionEmpty: Describe what you offer as a coach
